Key Match Events: Piero Hincapié scored the first goal for Ecuador at the 13th minute
Kendry Páez scored a penalty for Ecuador at the 45th+4 minute
Alan Minda scored the third goal for Ecuador at the 90th+1 minute
Michail Antonio scored the only goal for Jamaica at the 54th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
The line for Ecuador was 4-2-3-1 and for Jamaica was 3-4-2-1
